website_summaries.verdict: Good-quality hunting blind with 180-degree views and overhead coverage for the hunter.
pros: Big enough to have plenty of space for gear
Will keep you dry in the rain
cons: Once you set up this blind, you will want to stay put
It is heavy and not easily portable in the middle of a hunt

customer_reviews.title: Its a good blind at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality hunting blind. Plenty of options for arranging the screens and window covers for 180° views or for closing portions off to keep the sun from shining in. Kept me dry on the rainy days. I put mine in place just before season in early November and took it down the last day of season in Feb. It looked as good when I took it down as the day I put it up. Would have given 5 stars if the windows were a little easier to operate. I think I paid about $70 for it. I would buy a couple more if I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: and overall flexibility of the openings make this a great buy IMHO
customer_reviews.text: Used this blind two seasons now and must say for the money it is very much worth it! The fold-down windows and screens won't keep water out, but interior space, ease of set-up, and overall flexibility of the openings make this a great buy IMHO! Set-up is quick, just make sure to secure it properly (I added longer lanyards, as the units provided seemed too short to me)...
customer_reviews.author: Chris Neighbors

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent blind, reviews mentioned the door being difficult to enter, not a problem. The mesh takes a minute to open, one comment noted "hands got cold" buck up and come to MN in January. Its winter, put your big girl pants on.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Mader

customer_reviews.title: Good blind.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice blind. No complaints so far. Easy to pop up and back down. Easy to repack too. Relatively light so it's not horrible to tote into the woods.
customer_reviews.author: SDK

customer_reviews.title: Good blind for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Can be a pain the first time you put it together but once you have the hang of it easy enough. Wish shooting area was a little lower. I had my kid in the blind and he couldn't see out while sitting. My biggest pet peeve is the opening in the corner. You make so much noise trying to wedge yourself into it I tend to just tip it over and line it back up once I'm in. I do like the blind and would recomend to the average adult.
customer_reviews.author: Jason McDonald

customer_reviews.title: What a great blind!
customer_reviews.text: What a great blind!!! Way bigger and better than I expected. Strong. Easy setup very quickly and I'm new to the ground blind hunting. Excellent for beginners and quality for experienced hunters. Awesome colors too. The picture scared me a little. I thought it was gonna be too swampy green. Nope. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Denver Gambrel

customer_reviews.title: You have to pay to return it
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to tie the flaps back so if there is any wind on the day you use it, the flaps will rustle and make noise and scare away deer—happened to me twice. Returned it for this reason and seller is requiring us to pay to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: Not ‘shoot through mesh’
customer_reviews.text: It is a good blind. Sets up quickly and roomy enough. I’m only giving 3 stars due to misrepresentation. It specifically says it has shoot through mesh in the ‘better views’ section of the description. I contacted the manufacturer and they confirmed this model does have that feature. I wanted that feature and am disappointed it does not have it.
customer_reviews.author: momofkkkkk

customer_reviews.title: Quality blind
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this blind to all. Ease of put up/take down is great. 4 side view. 3 full window sides one side has an approximately 12x12 zippered porthole. Ordered on a Saturday afternoon and received it at noon Tuesday (standard shipping) so I would have to say fastest shipping in the market. IMO. Quality blind for the money. Don't feel as if you could do any better for the money. I ordered from VMInnovations.
customer_reviews.author: baseball dad

customer_reviews.title: Great blind!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blind! Room for two, but may be tight. Definitely comfortable for one. Easy to set up, great camo and camp screens that button down ( and can shoot thru if you want to). Had a deer 10 feet away from us and never saw us.
customer_reviews.author: D. H. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Needs better stakes.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made except the stakes are a little small to hold the tent in place and the velcro is a little noisy other than that it seems to work for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hunting blind for my husband. We set it up with ease and I was quite surprised with the amount of room it has. The only thing I dislike about it is how you get into it. Once it is setup the entrance is on a corner so you are unable to stake down on side because you have to be able to get into it. Other than that it seems really nice. He will use it for the first time next weekend for opening day.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Haskins

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I set it up in my living room to check it out and to get familiar with it. The windows all use thumb tabs or whatever they are called, no velcro. It will make it harder to undo the windows with gloves on. I suggest, you set it up outside and let it air out since it does come with that new smell on it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gamet

customer_reviews.title: 5 star blind and does not break the bank
customer_reviews.text: Great blind. Blends in its surroundings real nice. Easy to set up and the camo mesh is one of the best I have seen. Had a gobbler walk right up to the blind, I actually had to wait for him to back off where I could get a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Gena

customer_reviews.title: Nice blind
customer_reviews.text: Just received, so have not tried out yet. Seems to be made well. Good material and good seems. Will work great for my needs. Keep me from climbing trees. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PB4UGORIDIN

customer_reviews.title: Have Purchased Three So Far
customer_reviews.text: Great value. This is my third purchase. Easy set up by one person. So far no issues. Will update if any issues. Hunting season is just beginning in South GA and FL.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Good size for one person and all your gear
customer_reviews.text: Good size for one person and all your gear. One thing I did not like was the door opening. Sometimes it was difficult getting in or out. Other than that it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: This blind is large so take that into thought if ur doing now hunts . It blends swell
customer_reviews.text: This blind is big ,but also does match well into the good east tx hard woods . Very study and very easy to out up .no instructions needed really
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: It sets up quick and easy plenty of room for 2 adults and my 2 grandkids it's no heavy to carry it just great for hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Yankedog

customer_reviews.title: no
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blind that is simple to setup. Windows are huge and give you a great view.
customer_reviews.author: Russell F

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought blind for turkey season have had the upper end blind before with the high price. Did some reviews on this blind the price was good not sure of quality but I have to say it’s well worth the money. Easy to put up, like the design of the windows and shot threw screen. Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Archie R Carey JR

customer_reviews.title: Great blind
customer_reviews.text: In the style and size of blinds much more expensive. Plent of room and can be set up and taken down in less than 1 min. Been used on two gobblers so far. Well built and great window arrangement.
customer_reviews.author: Cherokee

customer_reviews.title: Good Blind
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and works well for the $$ - no real complaints. I have seen deer at very close range almost every time I have used it. Sits two people and gear ok but no more.
customer_reviews.author: Juggernaut

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Blends in so well, set up fast and easy! great space for 2 too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice blind for price
customer_reviews.text: This my second barronett blind. Happy with both. This one is pretty small but the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!! Very easy set up!!
customer_reviews.text: The blind is built well and pops up in minutes. I have sat in it to scout for firearms season. I've already seen a doe and a ten pointer. They had no idea I was sitting in my blind. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Norma J. Asher

customer_reviews.title: Like to get wet while hunting this is for you
customer_reviews.text: If you like to get wet while hunting this blind is for you. Blind is nice if it’s not raining but any rain you will get wet
customer_reviews.author: Pat Ayles

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: The blind did exactly as expected. It sets up easily and has a good camo pattern. I doubt it would hold up very long in the elements as the material doesn't seem real stout. Overall great product for the price and I'll likely buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Junk and poor craftmanship.
customer_reviews.text: There was a hole in the side by the door at the pivot point for the fiberglass rods. Made cheap and I don't have time to return because the season starts Saturday. I would not buy again. I will upgrade later to a better ground blind.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Knight

customer_reviews.title: great blind
customer_reviews.text: great blind. easy to put up and take down. kept it out all winter int he woods and at the end of hunting season took it down and it was none the wear for being out all winter.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice quiet windows, close to water proof and nice and dark inside.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Walls

customer_reviews.title: Great ground blind
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable and fits 2 people comfortably best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blind
customer_reviews.text: This blind is worth every cent . Easy up easy down. Cant wait to hunt from it.thinking about buying a tent from them.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Impressive / Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty blind. .. thicker than expected material and heavy duty zippers. Plenty of access 360 with mesh net still keeps you concealed. For the price.... the best I've researched.
customer_reviews.author: QUENTON

customer_reviews.title: Best blind for the money
customer_reviews.text: Best blind for the money, for sure. Very roomy, lots of windows and configurations to choose from, easy to deploy and pack up.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Han

customer_reviews.title: easy set up and takedown
customer_reviews.text: i use this as both a hunting blind (for which it works great) and also as a camping tent! fits 2 people easily and 1 person very comfortably while camping!
customer_reviews.author: C03storm

customer_reviews.title: Spacious
customer_reviews.text: This blind is spacious and sturdy. Plenty big enough for me and my 14 year old daughter. The windows allow for a nice breeze as it is very warm in SC when the season begins.
customer_reviews.author: Loni Miller

customer_reviews.title: Worked great! Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Easy to setup!! I saw three deer within the first hour in the blind. Plenty of room for one person.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Powers

customer_reviews.title: Very nice blind.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice blind for the money. Quite opening the windows. I'll buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Didn’t have any problem setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Clay and Tabitha parson

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a great product for the price. I have not used it in the woods yet but put it up in the back yard. It does have small holes all throughout the fabric. Not sure if that is just how it is made or what but it's nothing major that I would get wet. Looking forward to using it this fall.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Sowders

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, it’s quiet, mesh windows are nice! Keeps the rain off your head and keeps you hidden well. Have had deer up to 10 yards from me With all the windows open. I am bow hunting out of it as well. Plenty of room for 2 hunters
customer_reviews.author: Kayli O

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to bow hunt from. Comfortable enough for me with bow and girlfriend with calls. Only used for one season and it's held up just fine. I do not leave it set up for more than a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Hard to pop up fort panel.
customer_reviews.text: Really like blind but very hard get first panel popped up.
customer_reviews.author: Ssr

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Definitely nice getting out of the elements and really like all the windows in it. I put this up and set a trail cam near by and deer dont even see it or care about it good product for the money thank you
customer_reviews.author: Vernon green

customer_reviews.title: Works well kinda loud on a cold day but great for price
customer_reviews.text: Works well kinda loud on a cold day but great for price. Kept me dry in a steady rain too.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin LeRoy

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up and take down. Unfortunately doesn't come in a back pack, but made do. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: tghark

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room and large viewing sections!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic blind for the $$ Easily fits myself and my some. Really like the zip windows!
customer_reviews.author: J Mcc

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just like the picture and very easy to put up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but Maybe not for bowhunting.
customer_reviews.text: Sets up easy and has nice camouflage pattern. Haven’t used it yet but the windows seem a little high for bowhunting. May need a taller seat to not clip the bottom of the windows when shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the perfect gift for hunter
customer_reviews.text: Son-in-law so excited to get this blind! Love the perfect gift for hunter!
customer_reviews.author: BZ

customer_reviews.title: Great blind great price
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Great blind worked perfectly for me this last hunting season. Plenty of room for 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Brent J Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money but the door is kinda small and the steaks suck
customer_reviews.text: Stakes are small and don't hold it down to great but worth it for the money
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great blind
customer_reviews.text: Awesome blind. Kept heavy rain out and stayed set up through severe weather.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Williams

customer_reviews.title: simple setup
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up, widows are plenty and simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kena

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I got it yesterday, took it out of the box and set it up in 10 minutes tops. Take down was just as smooth. The inside has a nice black layer . The outside cammo is better in my opinion that what was pictured on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rice

customer_reviews.title: 360 degree windows.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy setup and take down. Blends in well with environment. Plenty of room for two adults with rifles. Only lacking long enough stakes to withstand Kansas wind but metal electric fence posts worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect. Very cost effective
customer_reviews.text: For our range of hunting. It's perfect. Very cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Quick easy set up.. 9 triangular windows and 1 peep window in the back. Nice camo colors on it. Will work great for spring Turkey season in central New York.. just wish it had a pocket or two on the inside for stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Tom stoutenger

customer_reviews.title: really well made
customer_reviews.text: Was better than expected. Camo is better than pictures show. Really well made. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Colors faded almost immediately. I now have a pink blind. Pretty sure that won't be good for turkey hunting. It's unfortunate because the design and setup are great, quick and easy
customer_reviews.author: Frank Castillon

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: The door opening is actually the corner of the blind. Poor design and very difficult to enter/exit. Zipper broke the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Dania Fennel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This lasted through 2 hunting seasons and going on it’s 3rd. Very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Will do the job
customer_reviews.text: Very nice blind have not used in the field yet.But looks like it will do the job.Delivery was quick
customer_reviews.author: Marz

customer_reviews.title: broke
customer_reviews.text: Product was broke at 2 legs had to fix to to use
customer_reviews.author: John urig

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Ya get what ya pay for in this product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, easy to use windows and zipper doors, lightweight, overall a great blind for the money. Fabric is "water-resistant" for sure. I wish the roof was at least water tight.... as I sit in it and rain drips on me while I type.
customer_reviews.author: daniel lucas hale

customer_reviews.title: Mabey keep it anyway.
customer_reviews.text: The door is hard to get in and out of. Other than that its good.
customer_reviews.author: Randall h

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Showed up on time and sets up in under a minute
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pattern looks good and hides well
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have a door and it's not the easiest to set up quietly alone in the dark. Pattern looks good and hides well.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S. Borchers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, take down.
customer_reviews.text: The blind is easy to set up/take down. Plenty of room inside, can’t beat this blind for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Brad MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Don't wast your money
customer_reviews.text: Blind blew away because the sewing on the tiedowns failed. Barronett told me over the phone that the blind was not suppose to be left out. He said they should be taken down after every hunt.
customer_reviews.author: jesse lee green

customer_reviews.title: Was very happy with this blind for the price it worked very ...
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with this blind for the price it worked very well... It is kinda noisy when setting up so don't be late when you get there I would buy it again for the price
customer_reviews.author: Rick Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to get punctured and super thin material with very ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheep nothing durable about it, very surprised barronett put this product out with there brand name. Very easy to get punctured and super thin material with very poor stitching on the seams and poor cut outs of the material. Be surprised if left up for a season to get more than one out of it. Only big enough for two small people more of a single man blind
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Windows are great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and sturdy cant wait use it this weekend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Barronett Radar Ground Hunting Blind, 2 Person Pop Up Portable, Backwoods Camo
product_meta.description: The Blind Radar in Blood Trail Camo expands to a width of 74" x 74" and a 55" x 55" footprint. This allows archers to shoot while sitting and as many as two people to hunt in comfort. In addition to the considerable space, the Radar is equipped with strong fiberglass poles and a durable five-hub design for easy set-up and take-down. Simply pop up and hunt. The Radar also features interior shoot-through mesh windows that can be adjusted on the inside.
feature_bullets: SHOOT-THROUGH MESH - Mesh camouflage window panels for use with multiple weapons and more coverage control.
LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN - Made with durable, water-resistant, tightly-woven 150D fabric with a black interior coating.
Rear peak window for additional viewing
Includes carry bag, ground stakes and tie ropes
